<rule id="javaee-pom-to-quarkus-00020" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project[not(m:build/m:plugins/m:plugin/m:artifactId/text() = 'quarkus-maven-plugin')]">
                    <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Adopt Quarkus Maven plugin">
                    <message>
                    <![CDATA[
                        Use the Quarkus Maven plugin adding the following sections to the `pom.xml` file:  

                        ```xml
                        <properties>  
                            <quarkus.platform.group-id>io.quarkus.platform</quarkus.platform.group-id>  
                            <quarkus.platform.version>3.1.0.Final</quarkus.platform.version>
                        </properties>  
                        <build>
                            <plugins>
                                <plugin>
                                    <groupId>${quarkus.platform.group-id}</groupId>
                                    <artifactId>quarkus-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                                    <version>${quarkus.platform.version}</version>
                                    <extensions>true</extensions>
                                    <executions>
                                        <execution>
                                            <goals>
                                                <goal>build</goal>
                                                <goal>generate-code</goal>
                                                <goal>generate-code-tests</goal>
                                            </goals>
                                        </execution>
                                    </executions>
                                </plugin>
                            </plugins>
                        </build>
                        ```
                    ]]>
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#build-tool-maven" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
